4Motor4WDSteering.__Comment: It is assumed that each motor is individually connected to its wheel, and the system uses steering control
4Motor4WDSteering.MaxMotorSpeed__Comment: MaxMotorSpeed is in the units of encoder counts per second
4Motor4WDSteering.MaxMotorSpeed__Comment2: This value has to be obtained by experimentation

4Motor6WDSteering.__Comment: 2 motors are linked to drive 3 wheels on each side, and the system uses steering control
4Motor6WDSteering.MaxMotorSpeed__Comment: MaxMotorSpeed is in the units of encoder counts per second
4Motor6WDSteering.MaxMotorSpeed__Comment2: This value has to be obtained by experimentation

2Motor2WDSteering.MaxMotorSpeed__Comment: MaxMotorSpeed is in the units of encoder counts per second
2Motor2WDSteering.MaxMotorSpeed__Comment2: This value has to be obtained by experimentation
